actions.name: Ancient Presence
actions.description: Effect:All creatures within Range lose -2 ATK and SPATK stages for 7 activations, and gain @Affliction[fear] 7.

actions.name: Ancient Presence
actions.description: Passive: The user takes 50% less damage from super effective Attacks. The user's Attacks are unaffected by the effects of [Defensive] Abilities, and ignore Type based immunities.
